title: U.S. Sanctions North Korean Andariel Hacker Behind Fraudulent IT Worker Scheme
description: The U.S. Department of the Treasury's Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) on Tuesday sanctioned a member of a North Korean hacking group called Andariel for their role in the infamous remote information technology (IT) worker scheme.
